{"currentConversationId":"bf7b3026-04ea-4835-aa62-4d67070a88a6","agentExecutionMode":"manual","isPanelCollapsed":true,"displayedAnnouncements":[],"conversations":{"7badebeb-ca79-49d1-9a4a-390ae3ce72ef":{"id":"7badebeb-ca79-49d1-9a4a-390ae3ce72ef","createdAtIso":"2025-10-26T14:54:10.560Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-10-26T15:26:16.833Z","chatHistory":[{"request_id":"a4d276f4-5af6-4b15-99a1-fd504822964a","uuid":"9f345449-a279-45f2-8fcd-7952176b97c3","chatItemType":"agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","status":"success","fromTimestamp":0,"toTimestamp":1761490450571,"seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"ffb2f800-0171-4ab0-965e-3668fe3fb59d","timestamp":"2025-10-26T14:54:44.830Z","request_message":"Các ImageView đã được cập nhật:
✅ imvTommy1 - wrapped in cardTommy1
✅ imvTommy2 - wrapped in cardTommy2
✅ imvMiley1 - wrapped in cardMiley1
✅ imvMiley2 - wrapped in cardMiley2
✅ imvDammy1 - wrapped in cardDammy1
✅ imvDammy2 - wrapped in cardDammy2
Đặc điểm:
✅ cornerRadius: 16dp (sử dụng app:cardCornerRadius)
✅ elevation: 6dp (giữ nguyên với app:cardElevation)
✅ background: Màu trắng (sử dụng app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white")
✅ ImageView IDs: Giữ nguyên để code Kotlin không cần thay đổi
✅ scaleType: centerCrop để ảnh hiển thị đẹp trong khung bo góc
Code Kotlin trong SuggestionActivity.kt không cần thay đổi vì các ImageView ID vẫn giữ nguyên!. đây là thằng augment code nó bảo, mày là thằng augment chat thì check lại xem đúng chưa","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"752de9b6-e08c-486b-8c15-49c696005ba0","timestamp":"2025-10-26T15:26:16.834Z","request_message":"hãy viết promt cho tôi để các chữ trong suggestion như Tommy, Miley, Dammy có thêm stroke outside màu #FFFFFF với 2dp nhé","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"}],"feedbackStates":{"temp-fe-b421a054-99bc-42d8-8d9e-8d03cb1aa02e":{"selectedRating":0,"feedbackNote":""},"temp-fe-d39af873-b4ed-42ac-9927-d709796508f4":{"selectedRating":0,"feedbackNote":""}},"toolUseStates":{},"draftExchange":{"request_message":"","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph"}]},"status":"draft"},"draftActiveContextIds":["D:/androidProject/ST181_Base_Maker/app/src/main/res/layout/activity_suggestion.xml","D:/androidProject/ST181_Base_Makerfalse","userGuidelines"],"requestIds":[],"isPinned":false,"isShareable":true,"extraData":{"isAgentConversation":false,"hasDirtyEdits":false,"baselineTimestamp":0},"personaType":0,"rootTaskUuid":"1b795ccc-428a-4056-a650-572b650345e9"},"bf7b3026-04ea-4835-aa62-4d67070a88a6":{"id":"bf7b3026-04ea-4835-aa62-4d67070a88a6","name":"Added white stroke to category labels
","createdAtIso":"2025-10-26T15:49:56.773Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-10-26T15:53:09.255Z","chatHistory":[{"request_id":"9c9048dd-c358-4482-b48c-7cffc7fd9143","uuid":"3f63f775-2fd6-46c4-8f8b-7f8aa1334440","chatItemType":"agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","status":"success","fromTimestamp":0,"toTimestamp":1761493796794,"seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"aff981f4-da27-4628-a0fb-39692406fc14","timestamp":"2025-10-26T15:52:28.805Z","request_message":""Add white stroke outline to the category text labels (Tommy, Miley, Dammy) in app/src/main/res/layout/activity_suggestion.xml. Apply a 2dp white (#FFFFFF) stroke around the text to make it stand out better against backgrounds." do it","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"f5521837-379a-42b6-9f04-617d03f25da7","timestamp":"2025-10-26T15:52:36.784Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"bab37a84-baca-420d-821f-414ea474baa5","timestamp":"2025-10-26T15:52:50.084Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"15fa5c28-29d0-4a98-a4f5-d5248fde00ca","timestamp":"2025-10-26T15:52:59.583Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"b589768d-b69a-49ad-8446-024947a247e8","timestamp":"2025-10-26T15:53:09.255Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"request_id":"75b3b1b1-3c86-4bc0-84bc-6eb509cb7d38","uuid":"d657fad5-0bd8-4559-b41d-4003f6570352","chatItemType":"agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","status":"success","fromTimestamp":1761493796794,"toTimestamp":1761493998372,"seen_state":"unseen"}],"feedbackStates":{"temp-fe-966aa5a2-6b10-49a0-877e-6eec83e15809":{"selectedRating":0,"feedbackNote":""},"temp-fe-dfd2a0ca-7a9b-4752-b6d7-ef2f89f8d980":{"selectedRating":0,"feedbackNote":""},"temp-fe-4ea2b859-b567-4c39-adcb-f951add238fd":{"selectedRating":0,"feedbackNote":""},"temp-fe-ad36e6ad-293b-4e1e-ba6d-46daca6519b6":{"selectedRating":0,"feedbackNote":""},"temp-fe-8ab17684-d0dd-4f87-9f07-2e4df385e8cd":{"selectedRating":0,"feedbackNote":""}},"toolUseStates":{},"draftExchange":{"request_message":"","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph"}]},"status":"draft"},"requestIds":[],"isPinned":false,"isShareable":true,"extraData":{"isAgentConversation":true,"hasDirtyEdits":true,"hasTitleGenerated":true},"personaType":0,"rootTaskUuid":"5c9ce53c-80a5-44b9-b8c9-4c589bf87dec"}}}
